description: An unexpected mix-up leads to a feline quip.
title: Meow Mix-Up
n_2: Realizing the mix-up, Jamie starts to worry.
n_3: Whiskers seems amused by Jamie's concern.
c1_3: This is no time for jokes.
c2_3: Lighten up, it's just a cat-astrophe!
n_4: Jamie can't help but laugh at the pun.
c1_4: Alright, no need to ask meow.
c2_4: Purr-fect, you're getting the hang of it!
